00006 dds::Publisher::Publisher() 
00007   : dp_(dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_participant())
00008 {
00009   ::dds::PublisherQos pubQos;
00010   pubQos.set_partition(::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::DEFAULT_PARTITION);
00011   
00012   DDS::Publisher* p = 
00013     dp_->create_publisher(pubQos, 0, DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00014 
00015   Assert::postcondition((p != 0), "Unable to create Publisher", __FILE__);
00016 
00017   this->reset(p, dds::mem::PubDeleter(dp_));
00018 }
00019
